name: Shoppy
tagline: Shoppy is an eCommerce platform written in php.
body:
### Shoppy is an eCommerce platform.
Shoppy is an attempt to create an simple, easy and useful eCommerce platform for small and large online store. It is free and secure to use.:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
